name: GoalProfit Inc.
description: GoalProfit is a low-code retail optimization platform to help retailers by retailers craft data-driven merchandising decisions. The company was acquired in March 2023 by Digital Wave Technology.

name: Grow For Me
description: Grow For Me is a crowdfunding platform helping farmers to scale up their operations. In October 2021 they were selected by Google Black Founders Fund to receive non-dilutive capital.
founder(s): Nana Opoku W. O. Agyeman Prempeh

name: The Good Face Project
description: The Good Face Project is a chemistry-first AI platform for the cosmetics and beauty industry to understand ingredients data. The company announced a $5.6M+ seed round in August 2022.

name: Breachbits
description: BreachBits predicts breaches 10x better with the only risk monitoring platform that thinks & tests just like hackers. They raised an undisclosed amount in February 2024.

name: Focal Point
description: Focal Point is a procurement management platform for enterprise customers. The company announced a $3M seed funding round in June 2022 from Susa Ventures, Amplo, and other investors.

name: Intelocate
description: Intelocate is an internal management platform for multi-location businesses to collaboratively plan, launch, communicate, and connect across projects. They have raised $2.5M+ in funding.

name: ReadyPulse
description: ReadyPulse is an enterprise social media platform for brand ambassadorship and influencer marketing. The company raised $8M+ in funding, and was acquired in 2016 by ExpertVoice.

name: Flipcause, Inc.
description: Flipcause is a fast-growing fundraising and engagement platform for small nonprofits. The company has raised more than $3.5M+ in funding.
founder(s): Alison Dale, Derrick Cagaanan, Xinjiang Lu, Emerson Valiao

name: Leasecake
description: Leasecake a commercial real estate lease and location management platform to streamline real estate operations management. The company announced a $12M Series A round in April 2022.

name: MeuChapa
description: MeuChapa is a digital platform for connecting loading and unloading service providers with a base of registered professionals. They raised R$6.1M (USD900k) in Seed Funding in May 2023.

name: Mentessa
description: Mentessa is an enterprise HR platform that works to improve employee onboarding and engagement. The company raised a â‚¬1M seed round led by Eleven Ventures in February 2022.

name: Leadsmart
description: Leadsmart is a platform for serving ads over Wi-Fi, offering efficient ad spend, and venue tools to gather key customer data for use in retargeting campaigns. The company has raised angel funding.

name: Autoparti
description: Autoparti aids non-digitized SMBs within the automotive industry in their transition to the digital realm, facilitating growth through a comprehensive SaaS platform. They were accepted into Techstars Alabama 2024.

name: OneCarNow!
description: OCN is a financial platform which provides gig workers in Latin America and the US access to capital for car rentals. They raised $86M in Series A round in July 2024.

name: GeoMoby
description: GeoMoby is a location intelligence platform specialised in geolocation and geofencing technologies, transforming location data into business intelligence. They raised a A$3M round in December 2022.
